universum.studios.android.device.connection

Class ConnectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.device.connection.ConnectionUtils

  • public class ConnectionUtils
extends Object
    Connection utility class specifying API allowing to check whether the Android device has some network connection established or to access info of the current established network connection.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isConnectionAvailable(Context context, int connectionType)
      Checks whether there is connection of the requested connectionType available or not.
      static boolean isConnectionEstablished(Context context)
      Checks whether there is some connection currently established or not.
      static boolean isConnectionEstablished(Context context, int connectionType)
      Checks whether there is connection of the requested connectionType currently established or not.
      static NetworkInfo obtainEstablishedConnectionInfo(Context context)
      Obtains info of the currently established connection.
      static int obtainEstablishedConnectionType(Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • isConnectionEstablished

        public static boolean isConnectionEstablished(@NonNull
                                              Context context)
        Checks whether there is some connection currently established or not.

        See ConnectivityManager.getActiveNetworkInfo() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access ConnectivityManager.
        Returns:
        True if there is some connection available and it is currently established, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isConnectionEstablished(Context, int)

      • isConnectionEstablished

        public static boolean isConnectionEstablished(@NonNull
                                              Context context,
                                              int connectionType)
        Checks whether there is connection of the requested connectionType currently established or not.

        See NetworkInfo.isConnected() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access ConnectivityManager.
        connectionType - Type of the desired connection of which current connectivity to check.
        Returns:
        True if there is connection of the requested type available and it is currently established, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isConnectionEstablished(Context), isConnectionAvailable(Context, int)

      • isConnectionAvailable

        public static boolean isConnectionAvailable(@NonNull
                                            Context context,
                                            int connectionType)
        Checks whether there is connection of the requested connectionType available or not.

        See NetworkInfo.isAvailable() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access ConnectivityManager.
        connectionType - Type of the desired connection of which availability to check.
        Returns:
        True if connection of the requested type available, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isConnectionEstablished(Context, int)

      • obtainEstablishedConnectionType

        public static int obtainEstablishedConnectionType(@NonNull
                                                  Context context)
        Obtains type of the currently established connection.

        See ConnectivityManager.getActiveNetworkInfo() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access ConnectivityManager.
        Returns:
        Type provided by ConnectivityManager or -1 if there is no connection currently established.
        See Also:
        obtainEstablishedConnectionInfo(Context), isConnectionEstablished(Context)

      • obtainEstablishedConnectionInfo

        @Nullable
public static NetworkInfo obtainEstablishedConnectionInfo(@NonNull
                                                                     Context context)
        Obtains info of the currently established connection.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access ConnectivityManager.
        Returns:
        Info provided by ConnectivityManager or null if there is on connection currently established.
        See Also:
        obtainEstablishedConnectionType(Context), isConnectionEstablished(Context)
